Once a Web3 social benchmark, Farcaster pivoted to wallets/trading in 2025 after social layer growth stalled and was fully acquired by its key infrastructure provider, Neynar, in 2026. The founders' acknowledgment of failure and pragmatic pivot is rare in crypto
NetNewsWire 7 released, requires macOS 26, but users on older systems can continue with 6.x with seamless syncing
The complex chord progression in 'Giant Steps' is underpinned by a simple 3-fold symmetry on a chromatic clock, using just 9 chords with strategic jumps
